review: The doctor is so professional, friendly and kind. The doctor gives you all her time to understand your problem. Doctor treatment is miraculous. I earlier never wanted to see my face in mirror because of acne and acne scars. She has been so patient and kind throughout my treatment. She is the best doctor I have ever met so far. She will prescribe you the minimal medicines and minimal skin care routine. The clinic is so hygienic clean and all the staff are so kind. I canâ€™t thank enough the doctor for her genuineness. The doctor treats her all patients with love. I would recommend this to everyone. After seeing my treatment  effectiveness my friends have already started visiting her.

visited for hydrafacial after my friends recommendation. i was so happy with the glow . my skin was feeling so much better. doctor is very pretty and so friendly. Also getting my laser hair removal done at kasper. the machine there is so painless and nusre surya always do excellent job.over all i higly recommend this place.

review:
took 3 sessions of prp and rhinoplasty with dr.sowbhgya. very impressed with results my acne scars disappeared fully and my skin shines now. Highly skilled and professional. explained the whole process ,the pre and post care , the maintenance everything was so professionally laid and carried out.
the clinic is very well located and in prime area. worth the money. staff are very very humble.
